message.body: Back at school now? How was your summer?
Hey... I was in school til now :( summer was good but flew by
That's fine... I figured.. I'm at work til 7 :/
And house is coming along... still waiting for some more fixing up before we have a house warming party but hopefully soon enough
Awesome! The fixing up is fun but can be a pain too lol. Our house will be done this upcoming week :) we are gonna have one too!
That's great!! So everything worked out since last time?
Yea we were able to get approved!
We will have tons of work to do still... our house is older and was vacant for 3 years... but as long as its finished being painted and such we will have the party. Modernizing it will take years
I hear ya... It's a pain to rehab. It's in richwood crossing which is near richwood and mullica hill areas
No idea where that is lol
